segments.name: iPhone
key_points: iPhone 11 was top-selling model every week
Three new models were three most popular iPhones
Double-digit growth in many developed markets
Strong performance in emerging markets
98% customer satisfaction for iPhone 11 series
84% of business buyers plan to purchase iPhones
Record installed base

segments.name: Services
key_points: Over 480 million paid subscriptions
Record App Store performance with $386M on New Year's Day
Apple Pay exceeding 15 billion transactions annually
Apple News reaches 100 million monthly active users
Apple TV+ launch with award nominations
Double-digit growth in all geographic segments
Third-party subscriptions grew almost 40%

segments.name: Mac

revenue.context: Revenue flat year-over-year on difficult comparison

Introduced Mac Pro and Pro Display XDR
Half of customers new to Mac
Record active installed base
Strong response from Pro community
Growth in all geographic segments

segments.name: iPad

revenue.context: Revenue flat year-over-year on difficult comparison

key_points: Growth in key emerging markets
Half of customers new to iPad
Record active installed base
93% customer satisfaction rating
78% of planned tablet purchases are iPads
Strong performance in emerging markets

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: Now size of Fortune 150 company
Record performance in virtually every market
Strong demand for AirPods Pro
Apple Watch set all-time revenue record
75% of Apple Watch buyers were first-time purchasers
Supply constraints for Series 3 and AirPods Pro
Double-digit growth across all geographic segments

gross_margin.context: Company gross margin up 40 basis points sequentially

products_gross_margin.context: Products gross margin up 260 basis points sequentially

services_gross_margin.context: Services gross margin up 30 basis points sequentially

net_income.context: All-time record net income, up 11% year-over-year

earnings_per_share.context: All-time record diluted EPS, up 19% year-over-year

New Research app with three health studies
Expansion of Apple Pay transit support
